private method context::Reaction::BOP::underscore::_check (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in _check: 8
sub _check {
  my $self = shift;
  $self->Error("The left-hand side of '_' must be an element or compound, not %s",$self->{lop}->TYPE)
    unless $self->{lop}->type eq 'Element' || $self->{lop}->type eq 'Compound';
  $self->Error("The right-hand side of '_' must be a number, not %s",$self->{rop}->TYPE)
    unless $self->{rop}->class eq 'Number';
  $self->{type} = $MOLECULE->{type};
}
public method context::Reaction::BOP::underscore::string (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in string: 6
sub string {
  my $self = shift;
  my $left = $self->{lop}->string;
  $left = "($left)" if $self->{lop}->type eq 'Compound';
  return $left."_".$self->{rop}->string;
}
public method context::Reaction::BOP::underscore::TeX (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in TeX: 6
sub TeX {
  my $self = shift;
  my $left = $self->{lop}->TeX;
  $left = "($left)" if $self->{lop}->type eq 'Compound';
  return $left."_{".$self->{rop}->TeX."}";
}
